I wouldn't say it would be that long like I think we'll know the date soon and then it just depends on when there's enough people to put in for a test cos they won't bring a ju a judge in if it's only like one or two people wanting to test they want to have like a full morning's worth of testing before they'll bring a judge
so they have to wait until they've got

enough people were there lots of people last time?

there was a fair few yeah erm lots of people do a number of different tests so people do like their elements and their freestyle and their field moves on the same day so then it erm it just ends up being that the there's not necessarily that many people but there's enough people to do a number of different tests otherwise it's a waste of a judge's time to come in and a waste of the money
so what's are they in a particular order that y you have to do one lot then another then another or is it just you'll do
erm
different levels in each type?

yeah you have different levels in each type so like it goes up to ten and then you have it in freestyle er so like the that's like your programme and you have elements which is like your jump spins things like that erm and then you have field moves which is showing off like the skills and the basics of skating to show that you can do footwork and things and then you've also of course you've got dance and they all go up to ten so I've got my field moves level one I've passed and my free level one I've passed and I'm working on my field moves level two my free level two and I'm working on my elements level one and two so that I can put in for them
so when?
once I've done level one
when you do the test thing then can when they come to test you could you be doing two or three different things is that what you normally do?

yeah you well you can either do it depends really what you've got ready for testing er my level twos aren't quite ready for testing yet so I'm not putting them in but I could very easily do level one and two in in in elements while I'm doing my level two and three and my level two in field moves but they're
